<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/backup/getbackupscount"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the number of backups for a period of time. The default is one month.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"from","in":"query","description":"The from date.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},{"name":"to","in":"query","description":"The to date.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2008-04-10T06:30:00.0000000+04:00"}},{"name":"paid","in":"query","description":"Specifies if the backups are paid or not.","schema":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
